I.15. Skills development programs are
conducted.

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
September 16, 2022
PROF. GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator This University
Dear Sir:
The University will be holding the 2022 Cultural and the Arts Festival on October 5, 2022 at the University International Convention Center. As part of our participation on the said activity, we are asking your good office to allow us to conduct an in-person screening for the participants on September 26, 2022.
Attached is the list of events and prospected participants. Looking for your approval on this activity. Thank you and stay safe!
Respectfully yours,
MELONA I. SAQUIN Head, OSAS
Approved:
GIL D. RAMOS, MAHisto Campus Administrator

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
June 2, 2022
PROF. GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator This University
Dear Sir:
In partnership with the Future Administrators, Managers and Executive Society and the Department of Management, our unit would like to conduct an entrepreneurship webinar entitled: “Entrepreneurship in the Modern World: Building and Adaptation of the Digital Marketing” on June 17, 2022, 1:00PM-5:00PM via Facebook live. This event aims to develop the skills of the students and other participants in putting up their small business.
Looking for your approval on this activity. Thank you and stay safe!
Respectfully yours,
MELONA I. SAQUIN Head, OSAS
Approved:
GIL D. RAMOS, MAHisto Campus Administrator

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
February 25, 2022
PROF. GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator This University
Dear Sir:
Respectfully submitting the proposed activities of the National Service Training Program (NSTP) for the Second Semester A.Y 2021-2022 for your approval.
Thank you and stay safe!
Respectfully yours,
RITCH M. BANATE NSTP Coordinator
Noted by:
MELONA I. SAQUIN Head, OSAS
Approved:
GIL D. RAMOS, MAHisto Campus Administrator
